name: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!

quotes.quote: I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone "not being a man" when it's convenient.
I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone ""not being a man"" when it's convenient.
